trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnBeginResizing(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnResizing(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs)" /> methods.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs> contains information used by an activity designer when a user resized the activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs> 包含当用户在工作流设计图面上调整活动设计器的大小时活动设计器使用的信息。

trans-unit.source: This information includes the designer edge that is being used to resize the designer and the designer's new bounds.
trans-unit.target: 这些信息包括要用于调整设计器大小的设计器边缘以及设计器的新边界。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> to use to resize the activity designer.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the resized bounds of the activity designer.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> value and <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />.
Gets the new bounding rectangle for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> on the workflow design surface.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the new bounds of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: 表示活动设计器的新边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer edge used to resize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner" /> on the workflow design surface.
The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" /> used to resize the activity designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 用于调整工作流设计图面上活动设计器的大小的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges" />。
